import {useState} from 'react' import { Nav, NavbarContainer, LogoContainer, PagesContainer, LinkContainer } from './HeaderElements'; import { Logo } from './logo/LogoStyle'; import {Link} from 'react-scroll'; import MenuIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Menu'; import {Drawer, IconButton, List, ListItemButton, ListItemIcon, ListItemText, useMediaQuery} from '@mui/material'; import '../styles.css'; export interface IHeaderProps {} const Header: React.FunctionComponent = (props: IHeaderProps) => { const [isDrawerOpen, setIsDrawerOpen] = useState(false); const reduced = useMediaQuery('(max-width: 690px)'); return (
{ !reduced ? Appointments Dentistries About Login :
setIsDrawerOpen(!isDrawerOpen)}>
setIsDrawerOpen(false)} anchor={'top'} sx={{ backgroundColor: 'rgba(0, 100, 100, 0.5)' }}> Appointments Dentistries About }
) } export default Header;
